title: 107_hr1473
content: Emergency Military Supplemental Procedures Act - Provides for the expedited congressional consideration of any defense supplemental appropriations bill to meet critical national security needs for: (1) Department of Defense operation and maintenance, military personnel, ammunition procurement, or procurement to replace a loss or expenditure of material, (2) the Defense Health Program. (3) military construction to repair or replace structures damaged or destroyed by natural disaster, or (4) Coast Guard operating expenses.
